name: Temple of Rust (itch)
description:
Temple of Rust offers top-down hack'n slay action with a mix of procedural generated areas and hand created locations. Control a young drifter on his journey through a wasteland filled with hazards and aggressive inhabitants. Utilizing a growing set of collectible abilities combined with your personal skill of using them. 

Features:

  • High quality sub-pixel art at 60 frames per second with attention to details
  • Procedural generated level segments
  • Tight and responsive controls - always stay in direct control of the action

THIS GAME IS IN ICED DEVELOPMENT! FINAL CONTENT MAY DIFFER!

I'm currently forced to ice the development until I've recovered financially but I'll be looking forward to returning and making this game awesome and  I would like to share the development progress with you! So don't forget to follow the project for future updates!
